rooms.title: Skyloom Gantry
rooms.description: A narrow gantry arcs from the observatory beaconry into open air, latticed strands of light forming a swaying bridge. Gusts carry the scent of ozone while thin threads tighten beneath each careful step.

items.name: Beacon Anchor Spike
items.description: Hammered from auroral alloy, it fastens skyloom strands to any surface without piercing the clay.

npcs.name: Beacon Runner Tiale
npcs.auto_greet: Step light! The loom reads every footfall and spins a thread to match.

rooms.title: Weaving Deck
rooms.description: Spacious platforms drift around a central spindle, each populated by artisans braiding luminous fibers into signal banners. The air hums with the resonance of distant lanterns answering their patterns.

items.name: Skyloom Filament
items.description: A strand of woven light harvested from the upper air currents; it thrums eagerly when exposed to music.

items.name: Stormglass Shuttle
items.description: A shuttle carved from storm-tempered glass that leaves sparking trails as it passes through the loom.

npcs.name: Windwright Seret
npcs.auto_greet: We're braiding tonight's warning chorale. Have you any spare harmonies to lend?

rooms.title: Listening Web
rooms.description: Dozens of taut threads spread outward like a spider's web, each vibrating with weather songs drifting from the horizon. Crystal bells dangle from junctions, translating the vibrations into readable chord progressions.

items.name: Horizon Tone Archive
items.description: A compact cube storing layered audio glyphs that replay stormfront signatures when unfolded.

npcs.name: Tempest Whisper
npcs.auto_greet: The gale is restless. Offer silence or it will take it from us.

rooms.title: Current Chamber
rooms.description: Coils of aeriform clay revolve within translucent housings, redistributing wind and light across the array. Surge gauges flicker in cascading colors, indicating where reinforcement threads must be spun next.

items.name: Skyloom Filament
items.description: This spool bristles with charged fibers ready to be woven into a stabilizing chorus.

items.name: Cyclone Resonator
items.description: A handheld device that captures stray gusts and converts them into gentle harmonics for the loom.

npcs.name: Skyloom Sentry
npcs.auto_greet: Stabilization protocols engaged. Present your weaving charter or depart.

rooms.title: Beacon Choir Array
rooms.description: A ring of lanterns circles the array's summit, each singing a steady tone that blends into a luminous chord. The city stretches below, its districts responding with faint echoes that ripple up the loom's strands.

items.name: Choir Conductor's Baton
items.description: The baton carries a microfilament core that remembers the rhythm of every beacon it commands.

npcs.name: Choirmistress Valyn
npcs.auto_greet: Hold steady and breathe with the lanterns; we'll stitch a return path for every traveler tonight.
